message.content: Yes, the authors state the full set of assumptions of all theoretical results in the paper. They provide detailed explanations, algorithms, and proofs for each result, along with the relevant lemmas and theorems that support their conclusions. The detailed appendix section also provides omitted proofs that strengthen the paper's theoretical contributions.

Yes, the authors state the full set of assumptions for all theoretical results throughout the paper. The assumptions and conditions are presented alongside the main theorems and lemmas, providing a clear and comprehensive understanding of the theoretical foundations of their work.

Yes, the authors state the full set of assumptions for all theoretical results in the paper. They provide the necessary context, background, and algorithms, as well as proofs for the lemmas and theorems. The main results, including the performance guarantees (Theorem 14 and Theorem 18), are stated clearly, along with their corresponding assumptions and conditions. The appendix section also includes omitted proofs from the main content, providing further justification and explanations for the theoretical results. Overall, the paper is comprehensive in presenting the assumptions and theoretical results.
